fields.eng_text: Names of the geographic area where the data collection takes place (separate them with comma)
A narrative summary of the cruise
Easternmost longitude of the sampling (decimal degrees, negative for Western Hemisphere longitude)
The ID of your funded project
The title of your funded project
mission number, with no spaces, dashes or other special characters
Northernmost latitude of the sampling (decimal degrees, negative for Southern Hemisphere latitude)
Provide the bibliographic citations for publications describing the data set. Example: cruise report or scientific paper
The collaborative research or programs which the mission is part of (separate them with comma)
Southernmost latitude of the sampling (decimal degrees, negative for Southern Hemisphere latitude)
Westernmost longitude of the sampling (decimal degrees, negative for Western Hemisphere longitude)
